EmailTemplate.subject: MIPIM 2015: AECOM Drinks Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MIPIM 2015: AECOM Drinks Reception
We’d love to catch up with you whilst we are at MIPIM this year and hope you can join us at our drinks reception to celebrate the coming together of AECOM and URS.
L’Ondine, 64 Boulevard de la Croisette, 06400 Cannes, France Wednesday 11 March 2015, 5.30pm–8.00pm
Please RSVP to hannah.quayle@aecom.com by Monday 2 March
